publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 70
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa David́niń saɣyndyrma miźmor. E Teńri ǯaḥtlaɣyn qutḥarma ḿeni H bolušluɣuma ǯaḥtlaɣyn.

Ujatly bolgejlar da rusvaj bolgejlar iźĺav́č́uĺar
ǯanymny ket́kejĺar ked́argi da iḿańč́li bolgejlar kĺav́č́uĺar jamanym- ny.
Ked́argi ket́sińĺar ujat alɣanlary üč́uń ol ajtuvču- lar ḿenim üč́uń bijańdik bijańdik.
Quvangejlar da bijańgejĺar śeniń byla bar iźĺav́č́uĺarij da ajtsynlar hamḿeš́a ulɣajgej Teńri śuv́uv́č́uĺar jarlyɣašyjny.
Da ḿeń miśkiń da jarly e Teńri ǯaḥtlaɣyn maja bolušluɣum da juluvčum śeń öźǵa t́uśĺu et́ḿagiń.
